text: No worries! I've asked around and one of our storyboarders (who did her Masters in directing animation at NFTS) hasn't used it in a few years but says it sounds like a similar thing they have with panelforge here, the timecode doesn't come until the editing, dragonframe will export the panels raw to then be edited - she said that she remembers an editor freaking out when she handed them a bunch of JPEGS. Is it putting out But hard to say without knowing more about the issue I guess? Hope that sheds a little light! I took a little look at the website, it looks great! Really clean and easy to find everything you'd want - the resume is short and sweet. The 'Reel' button is a little slow on my browser (maybe you know that already). I'll have more of a look when I have more time though! Some really lovely shots on your reel, and the separate breakdown is great.
